Reviews.Title: what a cool, tiny, and durable camera---and cheap!
Reviews.Author: porsche babe
Reviews.Content: I have this camera for about one week, took aobut 130 pics, using all the different shooting modes available.1. shooting modes are very intuititve and easy to use2. great quality pics, i bought the 2Gb card, you can store and take up to 800 pics of the best quality shots3. I saw the same camera in Target at $1804. it fits inside my little purse, it is no bigger than my motorola cell phone5. I was so happy with this little thing, taking pictures of houses, plants, swinging it aorund my wrist, and .... slipped off my hand hitting hard on a concrete pathway....and it survived!! It suffered no damages except for the few ugly nicks on the chrome part (stupid me).I am so happy!!

Reviews.Title: This Fuji is a top performer
Reviews.Author: robert johnston
Reviews.Content: Scientifically and industrially, Fuji builds world beater optics and optical systems. Mass market cameras are a sideline for them to privilege us with their technology in a consumer package.Here is the simplest, cheapest, coolest little camera among the pack of little cams. The view finder has a state of the art high resolution LCD. Picture quality is perfect. It's fast and fun. I'm not sure how you could make the user interface more intuitive. There is a lot of technology whipping around inside the package that I can well appreciate.Because the name is not Nikon or Canon, don't be put off. Fuji consumer products always seem to insure that you get more delight for your money as Fuji fights the known brands for market share by one-upping the competition. This little camera is a another great example.

Reviews.Title: great cam!
Reviews.Author: A. Anderfuren "journalist turned stay at home...
Reviews.Content: i decided on the fujifilm finepix z20fd after doing a hard core search for a small digicam. i also looked at similar nikons, cannons, kodaks.i got it yesterday and i am so happy with it after just taking a few random trial shots! wow!i TOTALLY rec this little cam if u guys r in the market.... i'll attach some pics i took last night in my trial run. oh and i did ZERO editing to these pics...this is how they took (minus i size reduced them to post).i'll update this review after i take this baby on vacation and print some pics!but so far - 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: A bright GREEN camera with sensational photos!
Reviews.Author: Movie Maker "Rik"
Reviews.Content: If you want a sexy little camera that shoots great pictures and video's, this should be a the top of your list.The camera is perfect for those who crave ease of operation,and a small easy to carry size.  The screen size is so nice--and clear!  Everything about this gem is intuitive- you will be up an running as soon as the battery is charged.The design is filled with style,and the color (get the green!) is vivid and turns heads wherever you go.The video feature is tailor made for YouTube and email--your friends an family are sure to enjoy your "productions".  The very easy to use "auction" or "blog" features make me love this even more!I would suggest getting at least a 1GB SD or SDhc card -  2, 4, or 8GB, to make sure you have plenty of space.Working in the motion picture and television indudsty, I have access to a wide range range of cameras.  People sometimes get hung up with professional quality vs something you really USE, day to day.If you buy this for yourself or as a gift, you will be getting a great little camera.  At a price under $150, you cant go wrong!You will love it, love it love it!

Reviews.Title: Great quality
Reviews.Author: J. Santos
Reviews.Content: The camera is smaller than expected which is good. Takes great pictures. The only thing I can say is to get a case for it. If you have it just lying around in a bag or something, It tends to push the camera "on". Other than that, the pictures come out nice and crispy so does the video.

Reviews.Title: Snazzy Little Camera That Gets the Job Done
Reviews.Author: M. Caddel "Jinxi"
Reviews.Content: This vibrant little camera really does the job!  Beautiful, clear photos and excellent resolution.  Very easy to use and how can you not love the dazzling Wasabi Green color?  I own 2 high-end professional cameras, but keep this one in my purse for impromptu photos & videos of my kids when we are out & about and it is perfect for the job!

Reviews.Title: This camera has everything
Reviews.Author: epact
Reviews.Content: I think Fuji outdid themselves with this product.  The camera features are outstanding, including video, complete memory device support (xD or SD/SDHC), and a rechargeable battery with a battery recharger (among many other features).  As more cameras reduce features to save costs and force consumers to buy add-ons and force proprietary hardware, Fuji is giving excellent quality features and providing the support to give consumers more options.The MP and video I truly believe can't be beat with this point-and-click that works fantastic even in low-light with the flash off (who wants to use the flash anyhow?).

Reviews.Title: Great compact camera
Reviews.Author: jd35lr "J Dye"
Reviews.Content: Gave my daughter the Z10 for Christmas. My grandaugter fell in love with it. I recently gave my grandaughther the Z20 for her birthday. It was another winner. Very durable, compact and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Initially great, but...
Reviews.Author: A. S. Templeton
Reviews.Content: 1) After only 5 months our Z20fd developed a vertical line in the display and captured image. The Fuji repair center refused to honor the warranty and "offered" to repair the cam for $70 plus tax, handling & shipping.2) Battery life for us was poor, and required a bulky outboard charger to recharge the removable flat pack.Then again, we have had excellent results and satisfaction with the Canon Coolpix series; buying this Fuji was a fluke based on the acid green case. I guess we'll use that $70 towards another Canon.

Reviews.Title: Good camera--watch out for lens placement
Reviews.Author: K. McGrath
Reviews.Content: I like this camera. One problem: the placement of the lens. For most cameras, the lens is in the middle of the camera. This one is located in the upper corner. Every time I hand my camera off to a friend to take a photo, I have to explain, "The lens is here. Be careful not to put your finger over it." Still, about half of my pictures have the picture taker's finger in them. *sigh*

Reviews.Title: A very sleek camera!
Reviews.Author: Greenmarker567
Reviews.Content: As soon as I took the camera out of its box, I was amazed by its small size and portability. I cannot get enough of its bright green color! Unlike my other digital camera, it has an excellent low-light performance for its price. I love some of my pictures I took of city skylines at night! In addition, I enjoy the feature which allows me to take two pictures at a time with different ISO's. Finally, I love the picture-protect feature which prevents me from accidentally deleting a picture, as well as the fact that the specific picture mode I set my camera to doesn't return to AUTO as soon as I turn the camera off. Get it!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: M. Murrey
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price. I bought it for the movie capability. I ride a dirt bike, and this is a great small camera that I can take along on rides and record movies. The movie quality is good, and with a 4GB memory card I can record 156 minutes of video. This camera is small enough to fit in your shirt pocket, and takes great pictures and videos. I paid $139 for this with no sales tax and free shipping. Bestbuy sells these for $159 plus sales tax. This is a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful little camera.
Reviews.Author: V. Shore "sleepless student"
Reviews.Content: This bright little camera gives you a lot for your money. It's small enough to slip inside a purse, and easy to whip out for an impromptu photo. Taking pictures and video is easy to understand right out of the box.The only issues I've had with it is how easy it is to erase a picture by accident after deleting another. The picture quality isn't great, but it isn't bad, either.All in all, it's worth the price, and who can resist that green?

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Content: This is a great easy to use product. The only probblem is that you can't zoom during the video.

Reviews.Title: Nancy in Trussville, AL
Reviews.Author: Nancy C. Elmore
Reviews.Content: Fujifilm Finepix Z20fd 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Wasabi Green)What a little "neon green" gem.  I purchased this little camera for its size and good reviews - and for the bright, cheerful colors offered....not to mention the very attractive price on Amazon.  There have been many times when I was traveling (locally or longer trips) that I saw a scene I wanted to capture but did not have my camera with me.  My Z20 is small enough to easily slip into my purse, or even a shirt pocket.  And it is so easy to use - its ready to shoot the moment you slide back the lens cover.  While my other camera has 10x optical and 5x digital zoom, and may be better for some shots, with the Z20's 10mp along with the 3x optical zoom, I can easily crop the picture to size and retain the clarity.  And the review feature lets you zoom in to the smallest features in the picture to be sure you have critical areas in focus.  It even has face recognition, which my more expensive camera does not.  So , I am well pleased with my little Z20 and can't wait to capture the sights and colors of Autumn.

Reviews.Title: Excellent 'budget' Camera, Sub-par if you're used to mid-grade cameras.
Reviews.Author: Jenny Bauman
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my Kodak V603 Easyshare camera. I was looking to replace it with another like-quality camera, but with added megapixels & features. The Kodak originally cost me $279, so when I found this Fujifilm Finepix 10 megapixel camera for only $159, I was thrilled! I figured I would be getting WAY more bang for my buck. And on paper, it seemed like it had almost every feature that other, higher priced cameras have (like Canon's Powershot cameras). Well, I was disappointed after only a few hours. It takes lovely brightly colored pictures, INCREDIBLE close-up macro shots, but the shutter speed and response time left something to be desired. Also, the pictures all turned out a bit grainy, and with lots of purple edges when zoomed in all the way.What it comes down to is quality of parts. Yes, this camera does everything it says it will, but not as well as higher priced cameras. You get what you pay for.If you're just looking for a fun point & shoot camera, and aren't picky about details, this would be an excellent camera. But don't replace a mid-grade camera with this one. You'll end up let down.I returned it and got the Canon Powershot SD1100, and am finally satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Takes very grainy photos
Reviews.Author: BW
Reviews.Content: I bought this and returned it the next day. Every photo I took (whether indoor, outdoor with sunlight, flash, no flash) was very grainy and just bad quality. I can't imagine how grainy the photos would have been if I had tried to print them! I normally use a Canon Rebel Digital SLR camera, so I may be "spoiled" by more professional looking shots, but I was looking for a point and shoot that would still give me decent quality photos so I wouldn't have to carry the big camera around. This was not it. I exchanged it for a Canon Powershot A1000 IS. MUCH MUCH MUCH BETTER! Same price, too. Looks like I'm sticking with Canon!

Reviews.Title: Holy crap batman, this thing is sturdy!
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: Okay, my initial reaction to this camera was only so-so. I liked it, but the picture quality left me a little miffed. They're not horrible, but not fantastic either. So I got a canon instead. It took great pictures for all of 24 hours before some drunken idiot at a party snatched it out of my hands and dropped it no more than 3 feet. That canon was trashed beyond repair; talk about weak! So I went back to my fujifilm. At yet another party, my brother in law was holding onto my purse for me. After some dude provoked him, in his drunken rage (I have got to stop hanging around drunk people) he slammed it like a hammer on the concrete, with my fujifilm inside. After checking the camera over, I had seen that the entire front casing had been bent and warped by the force of the hit. To my surprise, the lil' trooper was fine! It took pictures like nothing had happened. It lasted me a whole 2 years after that until I got myself a DSLR.If you're clumsy, or if you're like me and hang around too many douche buckets, this is a fantastic little piece of equipment. For me sacrificing a little in the way of picture quality was totally worth the exchange for durability. I'm even considering buying a second one to carry in my purse. At the price it's at now, it's totally worth it!

Reviews.Title: get it in green
Reviews.Author: cow hed "adrr"
Reviews.Content: well in a world where digital cameras fight to the death, i chose this little guy in a last minute bargain hunt. boy am i happy. or should i say was.... we'll get to that in just a moment. first the camera. with an amazing 10 mega-pixels,of course it takes better than average pictures. and the zoom is well designed. the buttons were confusing at first, but after toying with it, i got it down. i cant even tell you how many light settings and features this thing has. buy it, you won't be disappointed.oh, and if you're wondering, the camera will not survive if you keep it in your bathing suit at the beach, and decide to venture out in the ocean with it. i can guarantee that yes it was my stupidity, but it's not like i knew it was in my shorts. oh how i miss it....in loving memory of my beautiful camera.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use Movie Option
Reviews.Author: KPM
Reviews.Content: Although I have not personally used the camera, my daughter (11years old) has taken about a "million" movies and pictures since the middle of May. She really likes not having to switch to movie mode and just pushing the button on top to record - can't get any easier. The movie quality and the sound are really good and so is the quality of the pictures.

Reviews.Title: Worth it!
Reviews.Author: tbukski
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a vacation.And found the quality and price well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm Finepix Z20fd
Reviews.Author: Thomas Berkley "TB"
Reviews.Content: Great camera! Easy to use and easy to download pictures. Bought as a gift for my wife so that was important. I had the fortune of running into a Fujifilm rep while viewing this camera at a store and she was very insightful about this camera vs others. I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Happy customer
Reviews.Author: Cheryl L. Pyer "Cherylee57"
Reviews.Content: This was the perfect size for who I bought it for and loved the color.  Offers everything she was wanting in a camera for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm Finepix Z20fd
Reviews.Author: John Sugimoto
Reviews.Content: I specifically wanted a simple, compact camera for snapshots and to take pictures of merchandise for online auctions.  I'm pleased with having chosen the Z20fd.  There is neither a telescoping lens nor an automated lens cover to malfunction.  The manually-sliding front panel (shown in the open position in the product picture) functions as a lens and flash cover and is the camera's power switch.  There is a large viewing screen and operating sounds can be silenced for unobtrusive use.  There are plenty of operating options including an auction setting where multiple images can be included in a single frame.  A memory card must be purchased separately (but the camera can be used out-of-the-box with approximately 45MB built-in memory).  A separate wall charger for the lithium-ion battery is included; I bought an extra cell to keep handy for a quick switch when camera power runs low; without a spare, the camera is out of action while the battery is removed for charging.  All things considered, I'm very happy with this little camera!

Reviews.Title: One great little camera
Reviews.Author: Darlene J. Keith "darke57"
Reviews.Content: i purchased this camera for my daughter for christmas. she wanted a small camera, but i was looking for the optical zoom and MP more so than size. she has had problems before with the front zoom lens hanging or malfunctioning on other cameras. this one is unique in that there are no moving parts for the zoom feature. it takes great pictures, small and easy to use. great value for the $$. i wuld recommend this for any user.

Reviews.Title: Digital camera
Reviews.Author: Dianna L. Martin
Reviews.Content: What a great camera! It takes very nice pictures.  Quite a difference from our 8MP camera.  It was the only thing my daughter wanted for Christmas.  This was the best price I could find.  It's such a fun and easy to use camera.  There are a lot of fun settings to use too.  She wore it for a week straight - snapping lots of pictues of EVERYTHING!  I wish "Santa" brought me one too.

Reviews.Title: Mean screen green machine
Reviews.Author: J.M. "zin2win"
Reviews.Content: The display screen on the camera I received was about at the quality level of screens 20 years ago. When setting up the picture, or filming video, the screen quality was very grainy. I think it must be a defect even though Fuji's website indicates that vertical lines seen on the screen when viewing brighter objects such as lights on a Christmas tree are "normal" and not a defect. I haven't seen anything like that in many years. No other late model camera that I am aware of uses such a poor screen. It does look better when viewing the captured picture but why?I returned it and Amazon was great. I didn't want to try another.

Reviews.Title: Impressive, but a bit less than perfect..
Reviews.Author: Yolander
Reviews.Content: 10 megapixels, movie mode, simple operation, good battery life. All in all a great value for the buck. Just don't expect great pictures every time! You and the subject WILL be blurry if there is motion. Needs some practice with shooting as the auto-framing is a little slow and it's easy to jump the gun on taking the shot. A great backup camera and a great scenery/portrait camera for the money. Keep an eye out for accesory packages on Amazon as I found a spare NiCad battery/screen protector/mini-tripod package for under eight bucks!

Reviews.Title: My daughter loves this camera
Reviews.Author: S. Prehoda
Reviews.Content: This was just a perfect choice for my 17 year old daughter.  She popped in her memory card and is off and running!

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Rosey
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera to my 15yr old daughter for christmas. She just loves it. The size, the ease of use and the color were perfect

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera, A well received Present
Reviews.Author: G. J. Simoni
Reviews.Content: This is one cute little camera. Picture quality is amazing. Altogether a wonderful present for my daughter. The color is out of this world, makes it easy to find in a bag or purse!

Reviews.Title: Had camera for 3 days, used about 3 times and it broke!!!
Reviews.Author: Amy Van Kirk
Reviews.Content: I bought this little camera to have for New Years... and I used it a few times before the actual day.. it seemed to work just fine.. then I had about 20 great pictures on it.. and I  was reviewing them and got a read error... then I turned it off.. and back on followed the instructions on the manual, and still read error took the memory card out still error.. no pics on the internal memory or my card all I get is an error and it wont take more pics.. what a POS..  I returned it. I loved it while it lasted and I am so bummed because I always use me friends cameras and I finally bought my own and was so excited..  if I could get reassurance it isnt a normal thing that happens with these cameras maybe I will change my mind and give it anotehr try.. I just hate to lose anymore great priceless pictures..

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use
Reviews.Author: Jim Davis
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 7 yr old.  I was tired of the cheap kids cameras and wanted something that was easy to use and durable.  This camera is nice because it doesn't have a telescoping lens.  The front face slides left-right to expose the lens.  This helps keep the lens protected.  It's also cool that the camera automatically turns on when you slide the front face to the "open" position.  All these features combined make it durable enough for a responsible kid.  My 4 yr old has started using it too.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: VivKap "VK"
Reviews.Content: I received this camera as a birthday gift from my husband. I found the picture quality to be great. My only complaint is that the menus are not so easy to navigate through and I found that more often that not,it was too easy to get my finger on the lens. All in all,it's a great camera. I love the compact size and the bright Wasabi green color.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera for a great price!
Reviews.Author: munkeyluvin
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a very inexpensive digital camera to take with you to parties, to sell items on ebay, or just everyday snapshots, this camera is perfect.  For apprx $125, you will not find a better compact digital camera for the price.  It comes in great colors, it has plenty of menu options, and it takes good videos.  If you sell stuff on Ebay, the action mode available on this fuji camera is great. You can take up to four different images on one picture, so that will save you money on gallery picture costs while listing items.My only cons are that there is a 1-2 second delay between shots, and it took me about an hour to figure out how to navigate through the menus.But you do get what you pay for, and if you are looking for a regular, everyday camera, this one is good.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Shelly Mayo
Reviews.Content: This is a really great camera. I love the rechargeable battery and the internal zoom. I'm also extremely happy with how easy it is to use. The picture quality is great and it's about the same size as a deck of cards, so it's easy to take with me where ever I go. In all an amazing deal on a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: A. Thompson
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera as a birthday gift for my nephew.  He loves it.  He said it was easy to use.  He email me a photo he took with it and the photo look great.

Reviews.Title: yamichael
Reviews.Author: Yvonne Michael
Reviews.Content: This camera took great pictures and my daughter loved it. Its easy to use and it was a great gift.

Reviews.Title: Simple point and shoot
Reviews.Author: JUAN E MARTINEZ
Reviews.Content: I got the Fuji film Z20fd so I don't have to carry my slr every where I go some times you just want a photo wean you hanging out in a bar or what ever and if I take my slr I have to carry it in my backpack Then I just cant put my back pack down some one can take it and this just fits in your pocket the only bad thing I have to say is that my fingers are to big for the buttons in the back and I am always pressing the wrong thing but that's just me over all its just a simple point and shoot if you looking for something simple then this is you camera if not just by a slr

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: David E., Kelley "dek"
Reviews.Content: This camera looks great an does a good job for amateurs.  It is also very durable.  My daughter dropped hers in water under about 3 inches.  She dried it out and it works fine.  Also pictures are good, especially outside shots. Very good deal.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Great Price
Reviews.Author: S. Poole
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. I have owned it for month now and have taken loads of pictures with it. Some posted here. I only have 2 complaints about this camera the battery charger is bulky, no need for the cord should have been a direct plug in. The other is no fireworks or multishot settings.shutter speed is a little slow.Improve these and fuji has a perfect point and shoot.If you are looking for a great easy to use out of box camera at a great price this is the one for you.I gave it 5 stars even with the minus I have taken over 1000 pics and most all were excellant.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera
Reviews.Author: Timothy Martin
Reviews.Content: I have this camera witch it is amazing except it doesn't come with a hold button. The hold button would be used for me in a way that the camera couldn't turn on in my pocket. I usually carry my camera in my pocket because it can easily fit in there and because when ever i need to take a pic. it's right there. But I've learned a way to deal w/ it when i put my camera in my pocket i also take out the battery inside so it cannot turn on.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: G. Harrison
Reviews.Content: This is a great up grade for those moms who have daring children and need to take a quick shot of them doing something that mom doesnt really want to see.  It is significantly quicker than most of the older digitals that we had first.  The delay between button and pic has diminished greatly.  no this is not a slr type but frankly most moms i know with 3 or more (or less) kids dont have room for that in the diaper bag.  Till the diaper bag is retired and I have time to hold a camera and not multiple hands at once this will fit perfectly in my bag be it purse or diaper.  Not to mention the 10 megapixels make tightening and cropping better for later when you have time.  Like 10 pm when all the house is asleep and Im catching a moment to myself.  All told this will be catching a few more birthday cake moments before I get back into photograpy as a more serious hobby.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera at a great little price!
Reviews.Author: L. Taylor
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my daughter. She HAD to have a lime green camera and this one fit the bill. It takes great pictures and is very user friendly. I would definitely recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, great price
Reviews.Author: Manuel David Alvarez "MD"
Reviews.Content: This is a really good camera, small and easy to use. It has many options that I was not expecting to find in a product for this price. Videos have a good quality and sound. However, I found that most of my pictures are not clear. When I passed to my computer and I use them as a background, I can notice the pixels on the pictures. I have not found the way to make them look better even when I am using the max resolution.In conclusion, I am happy with the camera and its size. It is a great camera at a great price.

Reviews.Title: would NOT recommend this camera to anyone
Reviews.Author: B. R. Stahl
Reviews.Content: Wish I would have reviewed this camera more before buying, might be 10megs, but the pictures are grainy and the flash washes out faces. Bought it for my daughter,first camera, and wish I wouldn't have, she takes most her pics in b&w;, you don't see the grain as bad. Would not recommend this camera to anyone. Not happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Small, easy to use
Reviews.Author: Doris C. Moran "Lthousegal"
Reviews.Content: Got this camera as a gift.  I gave it only four stars because it's a pain in the neck to tell people not to move when the flash goes off the first time (that's when it's focusing).  I was taking a picture of my husband, the flash went off and he moved. I pressed the shutter down the rest of the way and it went off again.  The picture turned out great.  I'm used to having a viewfinder, so learning how to use the LCD screen is a new process.  The camera is quite small, fits in my purse beautifully so I'll always have it ready.  I like that it has face detection, anti-shake and redeye removal. Makes it easier just to download and print the pictures.  The slider that covers the lens is a great timesaver.  No more having to push buttons to turn off the camera, just slide the slider into position and your safe to go.  Been using this camera now ever since I wrote the review.  I've gotten a couple good pics from it but I don't care what mode I shoot in most of them are dark and unclear. I have to do enhancements to get a good picture. I like the size of the camera, the slider front but that's about all.  I'm now looking to get a Canon, I've had all the Fuji I can take.

Reviews.Title: Pocket Camera
Reviews.Author: Gary M. Talarico "super tune it."
Reviews.Content: This is the camera to carry all the time. It meets the top specs and the top style.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera for the price.  Wish all instructions for it's use were in the written manual and not on a cd.

Reviews.Title: Fuji Fun
Reviews.Author: Shyra Samuels "shizzle"
Reviews.Content: i love this product.  it is easy to use and takes GREAT pics!!!!  one of the best purchases ever.  i would recommend this camera to anyone professional or non-professional!!!

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: roger hewell
Reviews.Content: my daughter loved the color. the pics was ok. really hate this twenty work thing. I can sum it up in less.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Harmon Stevens
Reviews.Content: My previous green fugifilm cam was stolen.  I returned two other cameras I bought as replacement and longed for my old wasabi green fugifilm digital cam, now discounted model, So happy I found a refurbished one on Amazon at a third the cost of a new cam.  Thank God for Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great pics for the price
Reviews.Author: humberto
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter and it quickly became our camera of choice. Takes very nice pictures. Shipping was fast. Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: cool camera
Reviews.Author: Yes yes and yes
Reviews.Content: i love the color. however i no longer use this camera. i dont like that i cant zoom in on some pictures. that is annoying. this camera is now collecting dust. I would recommend this camera to someone who is not up to speed on technology and wants to play with having a camera.

Reviews.Title: Good product.Good shopping.I recommend this product.I'm happy with the result of this product. I would buy it again.
Reviews.Author: amalio
Reviews.Content: Good product.Good shopping.I recommend this product.I'm happy with the result of this product. I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: C. Elliott "CE"
Reviews.Content: I have owned this device for 2 years and I think it takes wonderful photos. It is easy to use and I have never had a problem. I am looking at these reviews today because I recently lost mine and I am considering buying the exact model I lost. There are lots of new features offered by Fuji, but I know this is a great little camera. By the way, I also own a professional Nikon. I know what great photos look like.

Reviews.Title: Green camera
Reviews.Author: L. Fredrick "L's best"
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift to myself. It takes excellent pictures and was well worth the price. It arrived very quickly and it perfect condition..I would definitely order again!

Reviews.Title: Best Camera Ever
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth R. Choate
Reviews.Content: I have one Fuji camera, and this is the 2nd one I've purchased. I am so not disappointed! I love it! This is the only brand of digital camera I will ever buy. The features are wonderful, and the pictures ALWAYS turn out fantastic, even though I'm probably the worst photographer ever.

Reviews.Title: The best camera,I have ever owned!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Perez "#1 Condors Fan"
Reviews.Content: This is the best digital camera,I have ever owned,takes wonderful,pictures,and you can make movies,depending on the memory card size,I had a 2 gb memory card,so with the 2,I could make a movie,up to 80 minutes,and almost up to 800 pictures,I got a 4 gb memory card,to be able to take more pictures,with the 4,I could take almost up to 1600 pictures,and a movie,up 160 minutes,its awesome,love this camera,the BEST!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm Finepix Z20fd 10MP
Reviews.Author: Patricia Finn "houston"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter. She LOVES it.It has some of the best features for a small camera.It is great that it taxes a SD or XD card. We alreadyhad both and did not need to buy extra cards. GREATCAMERA. I HIGHLY RECOMEND THIS CAMERA!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: GOOD CAMERA
Reviews.Author: S. Fuzzell
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A GOOD CAMERA - TAKES CLEAR PIX.  HAVEN'T GOT TO PLAY AROUND ON IT MUCH TO SEE HOW THE VIDEO IS THOUGH.

Reviews.Title: fujifinepix z20fd 10mp digital camera
Reviews.Author: Donna L. Hartman "drose1963"
Reviews.Content: I like this camera it takes really good pictures and its small enough to put in a pocket.  Very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera!
Reviews.Author: Barb
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with this camera.  The picture quality was supurb and it was very easy to use.  For those of you who are clumbsy or have kids that want to look at the picture you took "right away" this camera is perfect.  Why do I say that?  My last camera ( a Canon, which I also loved dearly) had a retractable lens.  My son accidently dropped the camera on a carpeted surface and the lens bent and would not retract.  Thus, my investment had to be trashed.  The Fuji does not have a retractable lens and thus the problem has been eliminated!  The bright colors are awesome!  I am still learning about all the features, but I would recommend this camera to anyone!

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: M. Wallace
Reviews.Content: we purchased this for my turning 12 year old daughter.  She is downloading video and photos without any help from us.  The price was great and the camera arrived 3 days after I ordered it so we were thrilled.

Reviews.Title: great -easy to use camera
Reviews.Author: element57
Reviews.Content: well described and works great. Small size - easy to carry - can run in full auto mode.

Reviews.Title: It ain't easy being green
Reviews.Author: Frank R. Wojtylak "FRWNYC"
Reviews.Content: This is a "fair" camera - picture resolution is fine.Recharging the battery is not as easy as with my other cameras.  You must remove the battery and charge separately.  Thus, when you want to take your camera and run, you must also remember to take the charger with you.  Would be so much nicer if you could just plug the camera in and when it needs charging.

Reviews.Title: Can not rate this product
Reviews.Author: William R. Grissett, Jr
Reviews.Content: Dont remember purchasing it and have never had one.  Could have been one my daughter had and if that is the case it is a great camera.  The pics from it were real good and she took a lot ot them

Reviews.Title: Question
Reviews.Author: GramW
Reviews.Content: Has anyone ordered this product from Amazon?  Does it include the battery and the charger?????  Thanks

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Brittany D. Walker "BD Walker"
Reviews.Content: I really love this product.. I never leave home without my camera...I don't buy desposable camera anymore because I have my digital camera

Reviews.Title: Easy Purchase
Reviews.Author: Mom Schreck
Reviews.Content: Great Camera - perfect for my 18 year old daughter.  It couldn't be easier to order through Amazon!  Great Service.

Reviews.Title: Cute and Small but Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Melissa Kane "justjumpit86"
Reviews.Content: I have owned this camera for over a year hate the quality of the pictures. I'm not an expert when it comes to cameras I'm not a novice either, and have larger better cameras but after a while the larger ones get heavy. So when I saw this camera I thought it would be perfect. Its light and portable however the quality does not make this camera worth the price. I have used every feature available to get quality shots and for close up (5ft) the pictures are for the majority are ok in quality considering the megapixels size. However, when I take pictures that are farther away then 5ft the picture quality diminishes as the distance gets further.

Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: C. Pakchan
Reviews.Content: This product is not worth to buy.  I bought this product for my daughter for X-mas present last year in 2008 and now is giving us soooooooo much problem.  I send this product back to Fujifilm for them to fix it and they fix it, two weeks laterly my daughter still have problem with this product and not really happy.  Don't not buy this product.

Reviews.Title: Fun Little camera
Reviews.Author: C. Anderson "Ginger A."
Reviews.Content: This camera is so small I can take it anywhere.The quality of the pictures are really good.Easy to use and very convenient.

Reviews.Title: finepix 10MP wasabi green
Reviews.Author: Paul W. Marcel
Reviews.Content: Camera is great. Delivery was very late, vendor obiously didn't have in stock. Paid for 3 to 5 day shipping, arrived in 11 days from a store 30 miles away. Amazon said they would refund shipping charges, no sign of that yet. A memory card shipped from another amazon vendor emails me saying order not shipped and can not estimate when it will be shipped,that arrived the next day. Very sketchy stuff from once excellent Amazon.

ProductInfo.Features:
10-megapixel sensor captures enough detail for photo-quality 18 x 24-inch prints
3x optical zoom with Picture Stabilization; 2.5-inch LCD display
Face Detection optimizes focus/exposure for up to 10 faces; Blog Mode copies 640 x 480 version of image for easy upload
Wirelessly transfer images to IrSimple-equipped devices, including other digital cameras
Stores images on xD or SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm Finepix Z20fd 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Wasabi Green)
